name: Werewolf
location: Wilderness, forests, remote areas in any hold
stunts: Regeneration: At the start of each exchange, clear one physical stress box (does not work if wounded by silver or fire)
Beast Strength: +2 to Physique when using raw strength (breaking, grappling, forcing open)
Savage Fury: When taking consequences, may immediately make a free Fight attack at +2
Night Hunter: +2 to Notice and Stealth during night scenes
notes: Werewolves are fearsome lycanthropes infected with the beast blood curse. They possess superhuman strength, speed, and regenerative abilities. In beast form, they are driven by primal hunting instincts and savage fury. Their regeneration makes them extremely difficult to kill unless combatants use silver weapons or fire, which prevents healing. Werewolves hunt primarily at night but can be encountered during the day in remote wilderness areas.
combat_tactics: Werewolves fight with savage ferocity, using their claws and enhanced physique to overwhelm prey. They prefer to leap into melee range and attack relentlessly. When wounded, they become more dangerous due to Savage Fury. They'll retreat only if severely wounded by silver or fire. They hunt alone or in small packs (2-3).

possible: If human form nearby: personal effects, clothing
loot.special: Werewolf pelt (50 gold), beast blood sample (alchemical ingredient)

variants.name: Werewolf Companion
variants.changes: Add aspect 'Honorable Warrior Within', add stunt 'Control the Beast: Can choose to spare opponents', mental stress increased to 3 boxes, can communicate in beast form with effort

variants.name: Feral Werewolf
variants.changes: Remove all mental stress boxes, add aspect 'Lost to the Beast Forever', increase Physique to Superb (+5), cannot be reasoned with, fights to the death

variants.name: Alpha Werewolf
variants.changes: Increase all physical skills by +1, add stunt 'Pack Leader: Other werewolves in the scene gain +1 to all rolls', add fourth physical stress box

social_interaction: Werewolves in beast form cannot be reasoned withâ€”they are driven by hunting instinct. However, Companions who are werewolves retain some humanity and may recognize allies. The curse can be cured through specific rituals (Companions questline). Silver Hand members are fanatically dedicated to killing all werewolves.

personality_notes.speaking_style: In beast form: snarls, howls, animalistic. In human form: varies by individual
quirks: Enhanced senses even in human form

special_mechanics.beast_transformation: Lasts several hours or until dawn
special_mechanics.silver_vulnerability: Silver weapons ignore armor and prevent regeneration for one full exchange
special_mechanics.fire_vulnerability: Fire damage prevents regeneration for one full exchange
special_mechanics.moon_influence: More aggressive and powerful during full moon (+1 to all attacks)
